EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.1739.Airscale.Email 1 - Highlights Video & Executive Summary
EmailTemplate.subject: Tomorrow’s radio access that’s here today
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Create 5G success AirScale Radio Access Discover radio access that will take you into the 5G era Read the Executive Summary <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200028]]> Now is the time to evolve your existing network to meet the needs of the Internet of Things and win the business opportunities created by 5G. Deliver services with unlimited capacity, ultra-low latency, extreme connectivity and the lowest-ever energy consumption. The new Nokia AirScale Radio Access does all this and more. New generation radio access that’s ready for 5G The future holds great possibilities. Be prepared, starting now. Nokia AirScale Radio Access <[[http://networks.nokia.com/portfolio/products/airscale-radio-access]]> meets your needs today and for the 5G future. Watch the video <[[http://resources.alcatel-lucent.com/asset/200031]]> © 2016 Nokia.
